classData.comment:
/**
 * Abstract base class for AI model providers.
 * Defines the standard interface for interacting with LLMs (Gemini, OpenAI, etc.).
 *
 * @class Neo.ai.provider.Base
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 * @abstract
 */
classData.description: Abstract base class for AI model providers. Defines the standard interface for interacting with LLMs (Gemini, OpenAI, etc.).
classData.name: Base

classData.comment:
/**
         * The default model name to use.
         * @member {String|null} modelName=null
         */
classData.name: modelName

classData.comment:
/**
         * List of required environment variables for this provider.
         * @member {String[]} requiredEnv=[]
         */
classData.description: List of required environment variables for this provider.
classData.name: requiredEnv

classData.comment:
/**
     * Validates that all required environment variables are present.
     * @param {Object} config
     * @throws {Error} If any required variable is missing.
     */
classData.description: Validates that all required environment variables are present.

exceptions.description: If any required variable is missing.

classData.name: construct

classData.comment:
/**
     * Generates a text completion for the given prompt.
     * Must be implemented by subclasses.
     *
     * @param {String|Object|Array} input The prompt or message history.
     * @param {Object} [options] Additional generation options (temperature, maxTokens, etc.).
     * @returns {Promise<Object>} The provider response (standardized).
     * @abstract
     */
classData.description: Generates a text completion for the given prompt. Must be implemented by subclasses.
classData.name: generate

classData.comment:
/**
     * Streams text completion for the given prompt.
     * Must be implemented by subclasses.
     *
     * @param {String|Object|Array} input The prompt or message history.
     * @param {Object} [options] Additional generation options.
     * @returns {AsyncGenerator} An async generator yielding chunks of the response.
     * @abstract
     */
classData.description: Streams text completion for the given prompt. Must be implemented by subclasses.

returns.description: An async generator yielding chunks of the response.

classData.name: stream
